author: julianfoad
msg: Fix access baton lifetime and use pools more consistently.
* subversion/libsvn_client/export.c
(copy_versioned_files): Use the sub-pool only for iteration, and the main
pool for all other allocations.
Rename "subpool" to "iterpool" to make this intention clear.
Do not close the adm_access baton until we have finished using it.
Eliminate the wrong error handling that would have occurred if
svn_wc_adm_close failed.

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #1622 - 'svn import' not URI-decoding created
intermediate directories.  Also, do some code cleanups and
optimizations.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(import): Remove an #if-0-ed section that'd been hanging around
since revision 2283 "for consideration."  I, for one, consider it
forgotten.  Also, remove the 'new_entry' parameter in favor of an
array of path components.
(svn_client_import): Stop busting up paths into arrays and then
reassembling them only so our helper function can bust them up
again.  Also, URI-decode the names of intermediate directories
that we create.

author: julianfoad
msg: Tidy up after r7905.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(import_file): Remove "!= NULL" for consistency with the usual idiom.
(import_dir): Move the pool clearing into the body of the loop as is usual,
now that it does not need to be within the loop increment statement.

author: brane
msg: Stop interpreting boolean config options all over the place, use
svn_config_get_bool and svn_config_set_bool instead. Also recognise
'1' and '0' as truth values in svn_config_get_bool.
* subversion/include/svn_config.c (svn_config_get_bool): Mention '1'
and '0' as supported values in the docstring.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config.c (svn_config_get_bool): Test for '1'/'0'.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c (svn_config_ensure): List
valid truth values for boolean options.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c (svn_io_run_diff3): Make has_arg an
svn_boolean_t and read it with svn_config_get_bool.
* subversion/libsvn_client/switch.c (svn_client_switch):
Remove commit_time_str, and read use_commit_times directly with
svn_config_get_bool.
* subversion/libsvn_client/revert.c (svn_client_revert): Likewise.
* subversion/libsvn_client/update.c (svn_client__update_internal): Again.
* subversion/libsvn_client/add.c (svn_client__get_auto_props):
Rename cfgvalue to use_autoprops, make it an svn_boolean_t,
and read it with svn_config_get_bool.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c (main):
Use svn_config_set_bool to set the enable-autoprops option.
Make store_password_val an svn_boolean_t and read it with
svn_config_get_bool.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c (get_server_settings):
Read the compression parameter directly with svn_config_get_bool,
and remove compress_str.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/config-test.c,
subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/config-test.cfg: Test booleans '1' and '0'.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(import_dir): Remove unused variable 'flags'.
(svn_client_import): Remove unnecessary level of braces left-over
from the days when this function used to also import to an XML
file.  No logic changes.
